name: Kawaii Anime Coloring Book
description:
This Anime Coloring Book has huge number of Anime pics, manga pics for anime fans and manga lovers!

Are you looking for an amazing coloring book with wonderful Anime pics? This is EXACTLY what you want to see


Features of Anime - Coloring Book :

1000+ pics 
Categories of Anime pics
Huge Color Palette
Excellent Zoom
Relaxing music
Sensitive touch
Save your arts to the Gallery

Just color pics the way YOU wish it yourself!

Inspire your creativity and Protect our Planet!
This coloring book doesn't need paper, pencils or anything.

Still thinking about download or NOT?
Absolutely yes if you like to relax, excite your imagination, listen relaxing music, color and recolor anime pics.

It's time for ANIME!
